articles.description: Auction house Sotheby’s announced a month-long series of exhibitions, events, and auctions showcasing British creativity for Queen Elizabeth's jubilee—and 50 rarely-seen spectacular aristocratic tiaras.
articles.content: From the official Platinum Jubilee celebrations in June to the multitude of events planned to mark the moment unofficially, Queen Elizabeth's 70 years on the throne are being honored in many ways thi… [+4026 chars]
